Required Skills: Full software development lifecycle: requirements development, architectural design, coding, testing
Unit testing (develop and execute test plans), debugging, and integration across subsystems
Participation in reviews: documents, designs, code, test cases, and user documentation
Effort estimation and status reporting; task prioritization
Agile/SAFe practices: PI planning, sprint planning, breaking down user stories into tasks
Effective teamwork and collaboration with large, global project teams
Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent
Experience: Minimum 5 years in new product design of software or software systems, including large-scale enterprise system development projects; at least 2 years in design/code review processes.
